title: Reconstructing Minkowski geometry from causal separations
summary: Aleksandrov, and then Zeeman, showed that the causal relations among the set of points in a Minkowski space of dimension greater than 2 determine the Minkowski space structure of the set up to a global conformal factor. We show that in any dimension the distances between causally related pairs of points determine the distances between spatially related pairs of points, and thus completely determine the Minkowski space structure of the set. This is a step in the direction of proving that causal sets arising from a Poisson process in a Lorentzian manifold determine that manifold up to the degree of approximation inherent in the intensity of the Poisson process -- the Hauptvermutung of causal set theory.

AI.tldr: 在任意维度中，因果相关点对之间的距离可以确定空间相关点对之间的距离，从而完全确定闵可夫斯基空间结构
AI.motivation: 证明因果集理论中的Hauptvermutung猜想：从洛伦兹流形中的泊松过程产生的因果集可以确定该流形（在泊松过程强度的近似程度内）
AI.method: 扩展Aleksandrov和Zeeman的工作，证明在任意维度中，因果相关点对之间的距离可以确定空间相关点对之间的距离
AI.result: 在任意维度下，因果相关点对之间的距离完全确定了闵可夫斯基空间的结构，而不仅仅是全局共形因子
AI.conclusion: 这是朝着证明因果集理论中Hauptvermutung猜想的重要一步，即因果集可以确定其来源的洛伦兹流形结构

title: From Loop Quantum Gravity to a Theory of Everything
summary:
Witten described how a path integral quantization of Wilson Loop observables will define Jones polynomial type of link invariants, using the Chern-Simons gauge theory in $\mathbb{R}^3$. In this gauge theory, a compact Lie group ${\rm G}$, together with a representation of its Lie Algebra $\mathfrak{g}$, describe the symmetry group and fundamental forces acting on the particles respectively. However, it appears that this theory might be part of a bigger theory.
  We will incorporate this theory into the Einstein-Hilbert theory, which when reformulated and quantized using a ${\rm SU}(2) \times {\rm SU}(2)$ gauge group, gives us a quantized theory of gravity in $\mathbb{R}^4$. In this theory, we can quantize area, volume and curvature into quantum operators. By using both the Chern-Simons and Einstein-Hilbert action, we will write down a path integral expression, and compute the Wilson Loop observable for a time-like hyperlink in $\mathbb{R}^4$, each component loop is coloured with a representation for the Lie Algebra $\mathfrak{g} \times [\mathfrak{su}(2) \times \mathfrak{su}(2)]$, unifying the fundamental forces with gravity. This Wilson Loop observable can be computed using link diagrams, and it can be written as a state model, satisfying a Homfly-type skein relations.
  We will show that the Wilson Loop observable remains an eigenstate for the quantum operators corresponding to spin curvature, but it is not an eigenstate for the area and volume quantized operators, unless the representation for $\mathfrak{g}$ is trivial. This implies that in the Planck scale where quantum gravity is important, we see that all the particles are indistinguishable, hence the fundamental forces disappear and only interaction between matter and space-time remains.

AI.tldr: 该论文将陈-西蒙斯规范理论与爱因斯坦-希尔伯特理论结合，构建了一个统一基本力与引力的量子理论框架，通过威尔逊环路可观测量研究量子引力效应。
AI.motivation: Witten 使用陈-西蒙斯规范理论描述了琼斯多项式类型的链环不变量，但该理论可能只是更大理论的一部分。作者希望将规范理论与引力理论统一，构建一个包含基本力和引力的完整量子理论框架。
AI.method: 将陈-西蒙斯理论与爱因斯坦-希尔伯特理论结合，使用 SU(2)×SU(2) 规范群进行量子化，得到 ℝ⁴ 中的量子引力理论。通过路径积分表达式计算时间类超链环的威尔逊环路可观测量，每个环路分量用李代数 𝔤×[𝔰𝔲(2)×𝔰𝔲(2)] 的表示着色。
AI.result: 威尔逊环路可观测量可以通过链图计算，并写成一个状态模型，满足 Homfly 型 skein 关系。该可观测量是自旋曲率量子算符的本征态，但除非 𝔤 表示是平凡的，否则不是面积和体积量子算符的本征态。
AI.conclusion: 在普朗克尺度下，量子引力效应显著时，所有粒子变得不可区分，基本力消失，只剩下物质与时空的相互作用。这为理解量子引力尺度下的物理现象提供了新视角。

title: Cosmologically Coupled Black Holes with Regular Horizons
summary: We present the most general and exact solution of Einstein's gravity sourced by an anisotropic fluid describing the cosmological embedding (CE) of a static and spherically-symmetric object, including black holes (BHs) or exotic compact objects, without radial energy influx and in an arbitrary Friedmann-Lemaître-Robertson-Walker (FLRW) cosmology. This is done fully considering backreaction of the local geometry on the cosmological dynamics. Our solution is free of curvature singularities at the would-be BH event horizon, thus solving a main issue of the CE of BH solutions proposed so far. As a byproduct, we derive a new CE of the Schwarzschild BH - distinct from McVitties's original proposal - that is regular everywhere except at the central singularity.

AI.tldr: 提出了爱因斯坦引力在任意FLRW宇宙中由各向异性流体描述的天体（包括黑洞或奇异致密天体）最一般且精确的宇宙学嵌入解，完全考虑了局部几何对宇宙动力学的反作用。
AI.motivation: 解决现有黑洞宇宙学嵌入方案中的主要问题，特别是曲率奇异性问题，同时考虑局部几何对宇宙动力学的完全反作用。
AI.method: 使用各向异性流体作为源项，在任意FLRW宇宙背景下构建静态球对称天体的宇宙学嵌入解，完全处理局部几何与宇宙动力学的耦合。
AI.result: 获得了无曲率奇异性的精确解，特别是在原本黑洞事件视界处消除了奇异性，并推导出施瓦西黑洞的新宇宙学嵌入解，该解除中心奇点外在所有地方都正则。
AI.conclusion: 该工作提供了黑洞和致密天体宇宙学嵌入的最一般精确解，解决了现有方案的主要缺陷，为研究宇宙学背景下的局部天体物理提供了新工具。

title: Fast frequency-domain phenomenological modeling of eccentric aligned-spin binary black holes
summary: We present the IMRPhenomXE frequency-domain phenomenological waveform model for the dominant mode of inspiral-merger-ringdown non-precessing binary black holes in elliptical orbits. IMRPhenomXE extends the quasi-circular IMRPhenomXAS waveform model for the dominant $(\ell, |m|) =$ (2,2) modes to eccentric binaries. For the inspiral part, orbit-averaged equations of motion within the quasi-Keplerian parametrization up to third post-Newtonian order, including spin effects, are evolved, and the waveform modes are computed using the stationary phase approximation on eccentricity expanded expressions up to $\mathcal{O}(e^{12})$. The model assumes circularization at merger-ringdown, where it adopts the underlying quasicircular IMRPhenomXAS baseline. We show that IMRPhenomXE reduces to the accurate IMPhenomXAS model in the quasi-circular limit. Compared against 186 public numerical relativity waveforms from the Simulating eXtreme Spacetimes catalog with initial eccentricities up to $~0.8$, IMRPhenomXE provides values of unfaithfulness below $3\%$ for $72\%$ of simulations with initial eccentricities below 0.4. For larger eccentricities, the unfaithfulness degrades up to $\gtrsim 10\%$ due to the underlying small eccentricity expansions and additional modelling approximations. In terms of speed, IMRPhenomXE outperforms any of the existing inspiral-merger-ringdown eccentric waveform models. We demonstrate the efficiency, robustness, and modularity of IMRPhenomXE through injections into zero noise and parameter-estimation analyses of gravitational-wave events, showing that IMRPhenomXE is a ready-to-use waveform model for gravitational-wave astronomy in the era of rapidly growing event catalogs.

AI.tldr: IMRPhenomXE是首个将准圆形IMRPhenomXAS波形模型扩展到椭圆轨道双黑洞的频域波形模型，在中等偏心率下精度良好，计算速度优于现有模型。
AI.motivation: 现有波形模型主要针对准圆形轨道双黑洞，而实际观测中可能存在椭圆轨道系统。需要开发能够处理椭圆轨道的快速、准确波形模型，以支持引力波天文学中日益增长的事件目录分析。
AI.method: 扩展准圆形IMRPhenomXAS模型到椭圆轨道：使用准开普勒参数化到三阶后牛顿精度的轨道平均运动方程，包含自旋效应；波形模式采用偏心展开到O(e^12)的平稳相位近似计算；并轨-环降阶段假设轨道已圆化，采用基础准圆形模型。
AI.result: 模型在准圆形极限下准确还原IMRPhenomXAS；与186个数值相对论波形比较，初始偏心率低于0.4时72%的不忠实度低于3%；高偏心率下不忠实度升至约10%；计算速度优于现有所有椭圆轨道波形模型。
AI.conclusion: IMRPhenomXE是一个高效、稳健、模块化的椭圆轨道双黑洞波形模型，适用于引力波天文学的实际应用，特别是在事件目录快速增长的时代。

title: muT2-NMR: Micro-Scale Correlation Relaxometry for in-situ High-Pressure Nuclear Magnetic Resonance
summary: Over the last decade, frequency-domain in-situ high-pressure nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) spectroscopy in diamond anvil cells (DACs) has been employed as a structural and electronic probe of condensed matter systems at pressures well into the megabar range. However, extensive spin interactions and sample heterogeneities under pressure often lead to significant spectral overlap, inhibiting independent observation of chemically similar spin sub-species in the same sample. In this work, we introduce a time-domain relaxometry framework specifically suited for DAC experiments, named muT2-NMR. Experimental flexibility and operational robustness are benchmarked on three hydrogen-rich molecular solids at pressures up to 72 GPa. We demonstrate that muT2-NMR can resolve individual molecular subunits in relaxation space, paving the way for novel high-pressure, high-resolution NMR applications in molecular solids.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为muT2-NMR的时域弛豫测量框架，专门用于金刚石压砧实验，能够在高压下分辨分子固体中的单个分子亚单元。
AI.motivation: 传统频域高压NMR光谱在兆巴压力范围内存在谱线重叠问题，无法独立观察化学相似的自旋亚物种，限制了高压下分子固体的结构研究。
AI.method: 开发了muT2-NMR方法，这是一种专门为金刚石压砧实验设计的时域弛豫测量框架，通过弛豫空间分析来分辨不同的分子亚单元。
AI.result: 在高达72 GPa的压力下对三种富氢分子固体进行了基准测试，证明muT2-NMR能够在弛豫空间中分辨单个分子亚单元。
AI.conclusion: muT2-NMR为分子固体中的高压高分辨率NMR应用开辟了新途径，解决了传统频域方法中的谱线重叠问题。

authors: the LSST Dark Energy Science Collaboration
title: Simulation-Based Inference for Probabilistic Galaxy Detection and Deblending
comment: 23 pages, 11 figures, 2 tables, to be submitted to the Open Journal of Astrophysics
summary: Stage-IV dark energy wide-field surveys, such as the Vera C. Rubin Observatory Legacy Survey of Space and Time (LSST), will observe an unprecedented number density of galaxies. As a result, the majority of imaged galaxies will visually overlap, a phenomenon known as blending. Blending is expected to be a leading source of systematic error in astronomical measurements. To mitigate this systematic, we propose a new probabilistic method for detecting, deblending, and measuring the properties of galaxies, called the Bayesian Light Source Separator (BLISS). Given an astronomical survey image, BLISS uses convolutional neural networks to produce a probabilistic astronomical catalog by approximating the posterior distribution over the number of light sources, their centroids' locations, and their types (galaxy vs. star). BLISS additionally includes a denoising autoencoder to reconstruct unblended galaxy profiles. As a first step towards demonstrating the feasibility of BLISS for cosmological applications, we apply our method to simulated single-band images whose properties are representative of year-10 LSST coadds. First, we study each BLISS component independently and examine its probabilistic output as a function of SNR and degree of blending. Then, by propagating the probabilistic detections from BLISS to its deblender, we produce per-object flux posteriors. Using these posteriors yields a substantial improvement in aperture flux residuals relative to deterministic detections alone, particularly for highly blended and faint objects. These results highlight the potential of BLISS as a scalable, uncertainty-aware tool for mitigating blending-induced systematics in next-generation cosmological surveys.

AI.tldr: BLISS是一种贝叶斯光源分离方法，使用卷积神经网络从天文图像中生成概率性星表，通过去噪自编码器重建未混合的星系轮廓，显著改善了混合和暗弱天体的通量测量精度。
AI.motivation: 第四阶段暗能量宽场巡天（如LSST）将观测到前所未有的星系密度，导致大多数星系在图像中视觉重叠（混合现象）。混合预计将成为天文测量的主要系统误差来源，需要新的方法来缓解这一问题。
AI.method: 提出贝叶斯光源分离器（BLISS）：使用卷积神经网络从巡天图像中生成概率性星表，近似光源数量、质心位置和类型（星系vs恒星）的后验分布；包含去噪自编码器重建未混合星系轮廓；在模拟的LSST第10年叠加图像上测试。
AI.result: 通过将BLISS的概率检测传播到其解混器，产生每个天体的通量后验分布。使用这些后验分布相对于确定性检测显著改善了孔径通量残差，特别是对于高度混合和暗弱的天体。
AI.conclusion: BLISS作为可扩展的、具有不确定性感知能力的工具，在缓解下一代宇宙学巡天中混合引起的系统误差方面具有巨大潜力。

title: On flying through the base of a pseudo-streamer
summary: Near the 10 solar radius perihelion of Parker Solar Probe orbit 24, a confined region containing an enhanced plasma density of 25,000 particles per cubic centimeter and broadband electrostatic waves was encountered. The solar wind velocity of 200 kilometers per second and ion temperature of 25 eV were significantly reduced as compared to their values in the ambient solar wind. These anomalous plasma conditions were observed on closed magnetic field lines, as determined from observations of the suprathermal electron strahl. Because the polarity of the radial magnetic field did not change sign on the two sides of the crossing and the crossed region contained a double-peaked plasma structure, the spacecraft must have passed through the base of a pseudo-streamer whose structure extended out to 10 solar radii. In the plasma frame, an electric field as large as 400 millivolts per meter was detected during the crossing. The current associated with this electric field was less than one milliampere per square meter, corresponding to a drift velocity less than 2.5 kilometers per second. It also contained a turbulent plasma with density fluctuations divided by density as large as 0.3, suggesting that the resistive term in the generalized ohm's law was significant. Also, the density as a function of time had a non-zero slope when the electric field was non-zero, suggesting that the pressure gradient term also mattered. As compared to earlier remote sensing and theoretical results, it is surprising that the plasma in this pseudo-streamer had a remarkably low flow velocity and that the pseudo-streamer base extended out to 10 solar radii.

AI.tldr: 帕克太阳探测器在近日点附近观测到伪流管基部的异常等离子体条件，包括高密度、低流速、强电场和湍流特征，揭示了伪流管结构延伸至10太阳半径的惊人发现。
AI.motivation: 研究太阳风在近日点区域的物理特性，特别是伪流管结构的等离子体条件和动力学过程，以增进对太阳风起源和加速机制的理解。
AI.method: 利用帕克太阳探测器在轨道24近日点附近的现场测量数据，分析等离子体密度、速度、温度、磁场、电场和电子分布函数等参数，结合磁场极性变化和等离子体结构特征确定观测位置。
AI.result: 观测到异常高密度（25,000/cm³）、低流速（200 km/s）、低温（25 eV）等离子体区域，检测到强电场（400 mV/m）和显著湍流（密度涨落达0.3），确定该区域为伪流管基部，且结构延伸至10太阳半径。
AI.conclusion: 伪流管基部等离子体表现出显著不同于环境太阳风的特性，具有强电场和湍流特征，且伪流管结构延伸至10太阳半径的发现挑战了先前遥感观测和理论预期。

title: Probing optical and acoustic phonons in heated nano-Si/epoxy composites
summary: Understanding the thermal response of optical and acoustic phonons is crucial for designing functional polymer nanocomposites. We study silicon nanoparticle (Si NP)-epoxy composites using combined Raman and Brillouin spectroscopy under local(laser-induced) and global(stage-controlled) heating. Raman spectra reveal THz longitudinal optical(LO) phonon softening and spectral broadening under local heating, indicating nanoscale hot-spots and interfacial scattering. Brillouin data track GHz longitudinal acoustic(LA) phonons, showing temperature- and concentration-dependent evolution of elasticity and damping. Contrasting heating methods unravels Si loading thresholds for isolated thermal absorbers, thermal percolation, acoustic attenuation and elastic homogenization. Local heating induces greater phonon softening and damping than global heating, with this disparity amplified at higher loadings by thermal gradients and interfacial dissipation. Global heating correlates with viscoelastic relaxation, showing intensified acoustic attenuation near the glass transition. Raman thermometry coupled with finite-element opto-thermal modeling allows evaluation of thermal conductivity of the composites characterized by increase from 0.09 to 0.46 W/(mK) for 0.07 up to 2 wt% of Si NPs, respectively, outperforming SiC nanowires at 2 wt% [D. Shen et al, Sci. Rep. 7, 2606 (2017)] despite bulk conductivity of Si being more than 3 times smaller than that of SiC. However, effective heat conductivity of our nanocomposites remain far below bulk Si, confirming that interfacial thermal resistance, not filler conductivity, governs heat transport.

AI.tldr: 通过拉曼和布里渊光谱研究硅纳米颗粒-环氧树脂复合材料的热响应，发现局部加热比全局加热引起更大的声子软化和阻尼，热导率随硅含量增加而提高，但远低于体硅，表明界面热阻主导热传输。
AI.motivation: 理解光学和声学声子的热响应对于设计功能性聚合物纳米复合材料至关重要。需要研究不同加热方式（局部激光加热和全局加热）下硅纳米颗粒-环氧树脂复合材料的热行为，以揭示纳米尺度热效应和界面散射机制。
AI.method: 结合拉曼和布里渊光谱技术，在局部（激光诱导）和全局（平台控制）加热条件下研究硅纳米颗粒-环氧树脂复合材料。使用拉曼光谱探测太赫兹纵向光学声子，布里渊光谱跟踪吉赫兹纵向声学声子。结合拉曼热测量和有限元光热建模评估热导率。
AI.result: 局部加热比全局加热引起更大的声子软化和阻尼，这种差异在更高填充量时因热梯度和界面耗散而放大。热导率从0.07 wt%的0.09 W/(mK)增加到2 wt%的0.46 W/(mK)，优于相同含量的SiC纳米线。但有效热导率远低于体硅，表明界面热阻而非填料热导率主导热传输。
AI.conclusion: 界面热阻而非填料本身的热导率是聚合物纳米复合材料热传输的主要限制因素。局部加热揭示了纳米尺度热点和界面散射效应，而全局加热与粘弹性弛豫相关。硅纳米颗粒在低填充量下即可显著提高复合材料热导率，但远未达到体硅水平。

title: Probing beyond-vacuum general relativistic effects with extreme mass-ratio inspirals
summary: We examine extreme mass-ratio inspirals (EMRIs) as probes of beyond-vacuum general relativistic effects, accounting for both astrophysical environments and scalar Gauss-Bonnet (sGB) gravity. In beyond-vacuum scenarios, the evolution of an EMRI immersed in a cold dark matter environment modifies the gravitational wave flux and introduces additional dissipative effects such as dynamical friction. In parallel, in the beyond-general relativistic settings such as in sGB gravity, the inspiraling object carries an effective scalar charge and emits scalar radiation. Both environmental and modified-gravity effects modify the flux-balance law, thereby inducing changes in the EMRI dynamics. Using a two-timescale analysis within the fixed-frequency formalism, we compute leading-order corrections to the energy fluxes for quasi-circular, equatorial orbits in static, spherically symmetric spacetimes and construct the corresponding gravitational waveforms, which are used to quantify the accumulated gravitational wave dephasing and waveform mismatch relative to the vacuum general relativistic case. We further perform the Fisher Information Matrix analysis to estimate parameter correlations and the ability of future space-based detectors such as the Laser Interferometer Space Antenna (LISA) to disentangle environmental and modified gravity effects. Our results show that both dark matter and scalar field effects can leave measurable imprints on EMRI waveforms and that a consistent beyond-vacuum treatment is essential for robust tests of gravity.

AI.tldr: 研究极端质量比旋进系统作为探测超越真空广义相对论效应的探针，考虑天体物理环境和标量高斯-博内引力效应，分析其对引力波波形的影响及LISA探测器的分辨能力。
AI.motivation: 探索超越真空广义相对论效应，包括天体物理环境（如冷暗物质）和修正引力理论（标量高斯-博内引力）对极端质量比旋进系统的影响，为未来空间引力波探测器提供理论框架。
AI.method: 采用双时间尺度分析和固定频率形式，计算准圆形赤道轨道在静态球对称时空中的能量通量修正，构建引力波波形，通过费希尔信息矩阵分析评估LISA探测器参数分辨能力。
AI.result: 暗物质和标量场效应都能在EMRI波形中留下可测量印记，环境效应和修正引力效应都会改变通量平衡定律，导致引力波相位累积差异和波形失配。
AI.conclusion: 一致的超越真空处理对于稳健的引力测试至关重要，未来空间引力波探测器如LISA能够分辨环境效应和修正引力效应，为测试广义相对论提供新途径。

title: MARVEL: A Multi Agent-based Research Validator and Enabler using Large Language Models
summary: We present MARVEL (https://ligogpt.mit.edu/marvel), a locally deployable, open-source framework for domain-aware question answering and assisted scientific research. It is designed to address the increasing demands of a digital assistant for scientific groups that can read highly technical data, cite precisely, and operate within authenticated networks. MARVEL combines a fast path for straightforward queries with a more deliberate DeepSearch mode that integrates retrieval-augmented generation and Monte Carlo Tree Search. It explores complementary subqueries, allocates more compute to promising branches, and maintains a global evidence ledger that preserves sources during drafting. We applied this framework in the context of gravitational-wave research related to the Laser Interferometer Gravitational-wave Observatory. Answers are grounded in a curated semantic index of research literature, doctoral theses, LIGO documents, and long-running detector electronic logbooks, with targeted web searches when appropriate. Because direct benchmarking against commercial LLMs cannot be performed on private data, we evaluated MARVEL on two publicly available surrogate datasets that capture comparable semantic and technical characteristics. On these benchmarks, MARVEL matches a GPT-4o mini baseline on literature-centric queries and substantially outperforms it on detector-operations content, where domain retrieval and guided reasoning are decisive. By making the complete framework and evaluation datasets openly available, we aim to provide a reproducible foundation for developing domain-specific scientific assistants.

AI.tldr: MARVEL是一个本地可部署的开源框架，用于领域感知问答和辅助科学研究，特别针对引力波研究领域，结合快速查询和深度搜索模式，在技术文档查询上表现优异。
AI.motivation: 解决科学团体对数字助手日益增长的需求，这些助手需要能够阅读高度技术性数据、精确引用并在认证网络中操作，特别是在处理私有数据和专业领域知识时。
AI.method: 结合快速查询路径和DeepSearch深度搜索模式，后者整合了检索增强生成和蒙特卡洛树搜索，探索互补子查询，为有前景的分支分配更多计算资源，并维护全局证据账本以保留来源信息。
AI.result: 在公开替代数据集上，MARVEL在文献中心查询上与GPT-4o mini基线相当，在探测器操作内容上显著优于基线，特别是在领域检索和引导推理起决定性作用的情况下。
AI.conclusion: MARVEL提供了一个可复现的基础框架，用于开发领域特定的科学助手，通过开源完整框架和评估数据集，支持科学团体构建自己的专业问答系统。

title: Properties of Magnetic Switchbacks in the Near-Sun Solar Wind
comment: 44 pages, 20 figures, accepted in Space Science Reviews
summary: Magnetic switchbacks are fluctuations in the solar wind in which the interplanetary magnetic field sharply deflects away from its background direction so as to create folds in magnetic field lines while remaining of roughly constant magnitude. The magnetic field and velocity fluctuations are extremely well correlated in a way corresponding to Alfvénic fluctuations propagating away from the Sun. For a background field which is nearly radial this causes an outwardly propagating jet to form. Switchbacks and their characteristic velocity jets have recently been observed to be nearly ubiquitous by Parker Solar Probe with in situ measurements in the inner heliosphere within 0.3 AU. Their prevalence, substantial energy content, and potentially fundamental role in the dynamics of the outer corona and solar wind motivate the significant research efforts into their understanding. Here we review the in situ measurements of these structures (primarily by Parker Solar Probe). We discuss how they are identified and measured, and present an overview of the primary observational properties of these structures, both in terms of individual switchbacks and their collective arrangement into ``patches''. We identify both properties for which there is a strong consensus and those that have limited or qualified support and require further investigation. We identify and collate several open questions and recommendations for future studies.

AI.tldr: 该论文综述了太阳风中的磁场反转现象，主要基于帕克太阳探测器的原位测量数据，总结了这些结构的观测特性、识别方法以及当前研究中的共识与未解问题。
AI.motivation: 磁场反转是太阳风中普遍存在的现象，具有显著的能量含量，可能在外层日冕和太阳风动力学中发挥重要作用，因此需要对其性质进行系统研究和理解。
AI.method: 主要基于帕克太阳探测器的原位测量数据，通过分析磁场和速度波动之间的相关性来识别和测量这些结构，并研究单个反转结构及其聚集成"斑块"的集体排列特征。
AI.result: 磁场反转在0.3 AU以内的内日球层中几乎无处不在，表现为磁场方向急剧偏转但幅度大致保持恒定，磁场和速度波动高度相关，形成向外传播的阿尔芬波和喷流。
AI.conclusion: 论文总结了磁场反转的主要观测特性，指出了研究中的共识领域和需要进一步验证的有限支持观点，并提出了几个开放性问题和建议，为未来研究提供了方向。

title: Superradiant scattering by rotating black-bounce black holes
summary: We investigate superradiant scattering off a rotating regular black hole described by a black-bounce metric which generalizes the Kerr spacetime of mass $M$ and specific angular momentum $a$ through a regularization parameter $p$ and two deformation exponents $(k,n)$. Focusing on massless $(\ell,m)=(1,1)$ scalar modes, we explore the parameter space and compute amplification factors by numerically integrating the separated radial Klein-Gordon equation. We track the peak amplification and the corresponding frequency across the $(a/M,p/M)$ parameter space for several combinations of $k$ and $n$. We find that increasing $n$ systematically enhances superradiance, whereas increasing $k$ tends to suppress it. In particular, certain configurations yield amplification levels up to 98% larger than the maximum amplification for standard Kerr black holes.

AI.tldr: 研究旋转规则黑洞的超辐射散射，使用黑弹跳度规推广Kerr时空，通过正则化参数p和变形指数(k,n)分析参数空间，发现增加n增强超辐射，增加k抑制超辐射，某些配置的超辐射放大比标准Kerr黑洞最大放大高98%
AI.motivation: 研究旋转规则黑洞的超辐射散射现象，探索黑弹跳度规推广的Kerr时空参数空间，了解正则化参数p和变形指数(k,n)如何影响超辐射放大效应
AI.method: 采用黑弹跳度规描述旋转规则黑洞，推广标准Kerr时空，引入正则化参数p和两个变形指数(k,n)。聚焦于无质量(ℓ,m)=(1,1)标量模，通过数值积分分离的径向Klein-Gordon方程计算放大因子，追踪参数空间(a/M, p/M)中的峰值放大和对应频率
AI.result: 发现增加变形指数n会系统性地增强超辐射效应，而增加变形指数k则倾向于抑制超辐射。某些特定配置的超辐射放大水平比标准Kerr黑洞的最大放大高出98%
AI.conclusion: 黑弹跳度规推广的旋转规则黑洞中，变形指数(k,n)对超辐射有显著影响：n增强超辐射，k抑制超辐射，某些参数配置能产生比标准Kerr黑洞强得多的超辐射放大效应

title: Modelling spacecraft-emitted electrons measured by SWA-EAS experiment on board Solar Orbiter mission
summary: Thermal electron measurements in space plasmas typically suffer at low energies from spacecraft emissions of photo- and secondary electrons and from charging of the spacecraft body. We examine these effects by use of numerical simulations in the context of electron measurements acquired by the Electron Analyser System (SWA-EAS) on board the Solar Orbiter mission. We employed the Spacecraft Plasma Interaction Software to model the interaction of the Solar Orbiter spacecraft with solar wind plasma and we implemented a virtual detector to simulate the measured electron energy spectra as observed in situ by the SWA-EAS experiment. Numerical simulations were set according to the measured plasma conditions at 0.3~AU. We derived the simulated electron energy spectra as detected by the virtual SWA-EAS experiment for different electron populations and compared these with both the initial plasma conditions and the corresponding real SWA-EAS data samples. We found qualitative agreement between the simulated and real data observed in situ by the SWA-EAS detector. Contrary to other space missions, the contamination by cold electrons emitted from the spacecraft is seen well above the spacecraft potential energy threshold. A detailed analysis of the simulated electron energy spectra demonstrates that contamination above the threshold is a result of cold electron fluxes emitted from distant spacecraft surfaces. The relative position of the break in the simulated spectrum with respect to the spacecraft potential slightly deviates from that in the real observations. This may indicate that the real potential of the SWA-EAS detector with respect to ambient plasma differs from the spacecraft potential value measured on board. The overall contamination is shown to be composed of emissions from a number of different sources and their relative contribution varies with the ambient plasma conditions.

AI.tldr: 研究使用数值模拟分析Solar Orbiter任务中SWA-EAS电子测量在低能段的污染问题，发现航天器发射的冷电子污染显著高于航天器电位阈值，主要来自远距离表面发射。
AI.motivation: 空间等离子体中的热电子测量在低能段常受航天器光电子、二次电子发射和充电效应污染，需要量化这些效应对Solar Orbiter任务中SWA-EAS测量的影响。
AI.method: 使用航天器等离子体相互作用软件模拟Solar Orbiter与太阳风等离子体相互作用，实现虚拟探测器模拟SWA-EAS测量的电子能谱，在0.3 AU等离子体条件下进行数值模拟。
AI.result: 模拟与真实SWA-EAS数据定性一致，冷电子污染显著高于航天器电位阈值，主要来自远距离表面发射；谱断裂位置与航天器电位存在偏差，表明探测器实际电位可能与航天器电位不同。
AI.conclusion: SWA-EAS电子测量受多种来源的污染，污染程度随环境等离子体条件变化；需要进一步研究探测器实际电位与航天器电位的差异以改进测量精度。

title: Constraining Lorentz and parity violations in gravity with multiband gravitational wave observations
summary: This study evaluates the capability of future multi-band observations of gravitational waves emitted from binary black hole coalescences, utilizing joint third-generation ground-based (CE, ET) and space-based (LISA, Taiji, TianQin) detector networks, to constrain parity and Lorentz symmetry violations in the gravitational sector. We model these effects through a parameterized waveform framework that incorporates a set of parameters that quantify potential deviations from general relativity. The frequency-dependence of their effects is described by power-law indices $β$ (i.e., $β_{\bar ν}$, $β_{\bar μ}$, $β_ν$, and $β_μ$). By analyzing events such as a high-signal noise ratio (SNR) "golden event" like GW250114 and a massive binary system like GW231123 (total mass $190-265 M_\odot$) using two networks of ground- and space-based detectors, we demonstrate that multi-band observations can significantly improve the current constraints on Lorentz and parity violations by several order of magnitude, for both high-frequency ($β> 0$) and low-frequency ($β< 0$) modifications. Our Bayesian analysis reveals that while the exceptional SNR of the GW250114-like event yields superior constraints for high-frequency modifications ($β> 0$), the massive nature of GW231123 provides more stringent limits for low-frequency effects ($β< 0$). This work highlights the critical value of future multi-band gravitational wave astronomy for conducting precision tests of general relativity across diverse binary populations.

AI.tldr: 未来多波段引力波观测（地面第三代+空间探测器网络）可显著改进对引力中宇称和洛伦兹对称性破缺的约束，提升数个数量级。
AI.motivation: 利用未来多波段引力波观测网络（CE、ET、LISA、Taiji、TianQin）来检验广义相对论，特别是对引力中的宇称和洛伦兹对称性破缺进行高精度测试。
AI.method: 建立参数化波形框架，引入量化广义相对论偏离的参数（β参数），通过贝叶斯分析高信噪比"黄金事件"（如GW250114）和大质量双黑洞系统（如GW231123），使用地面和空间探测器网络进行多波段观测。
AI.result: 多波段观测能将当前对洛伦兹和宇称对称性破缺的约束改进数个数量级；高信噪比事件对高频修正（β>0）约束更优，大质量系统对低频修正（β<0）约束更严格。
AI.conclusion: 未来多波段引力波天文学对于在不同双星群体中进行广义相对论的精密测试具有关键价值，能显著提升对基本对称性检验的精度。

title: Science with a large field-of-view polarization survey: The Large Array Survey Telescope Polarization Node (LAST-P)
comment: Accepted for publication in Publications of the Astronomical Society of the Pacific (PASP) on January 6, 2026. Corresponding authors: V. Barbosa Martins, N. Jordana Mitjans, S. Garrappa, A. Franckowiak, E. O. Ofek
summary: Optical polarimetry provides information on the geometry of the emitting region, the magnetic field configuration and the properties of dust in astrophysical sources. Current state-of-the-art instruments typically have a small field of view (FoV), which poses a challenge for conducting wide surveys. We propose the construction of the Large Array Survey Telescope Polarization Node (LAST-P), a wide-field array of optical polarimeters. LAST-P is designed for high-cadence ($\lesssim 1$ day) polarization monitoring of numerous astrophysical transients, such as the early phases of gamma-ray bursts, supernovae, and novae. Furthermore, LAST-P will facilitate the creation of extensive polarization catalogs for X-ray binaries and white dwarfs, alongside a large FoV study of the interstellar medium. In survey mode, LAST-P will cover a FoV of 88.8 deg$^2$. With a 15 x 1-minute exposure, the instrument will be capable of measuring polarization of sources as faint as Gaia Bp-magnitude $\sim$20.9. The precision on the linear polarization degree (PD) will reach 0.7\%, 1.5\%, and 3.5\% for sources with magnitudes 17, 18, and 19, respectively, for a seeing of 2.7 arcsec, air mass of about 1 for observations in dark locations. We propose three distinct non-simultaneous survey strategies, among them an active galactic nuclei (AGN) strategy for long-term monitoring of $\sim$200 AGN with $<$1-day cadence. In this paper, we present the predicted sensitivity of the instrument and outline the various science cases it is designed to explore.

AI.tldr: LAST-P是一个宽视场光学偏振仪阵列，用于高频率监测天体物理瞬变源，并创建大规模偏振星表，视场达88.8平方度。
AI.motivation: 当前最先进的光学偏振仪通常视场较小，难以进行大规模巡天观测。需要宽视场偏振仪来监测大量天体物理瞬变源（如伽马暴、超新星、新星）的早期偏振变化，并创建X射线双星、白矮星等源的偏振星表。
AI.method: 提出建造LAST-P（大型阵列巡天望远镜偏振节点），这是一个宽视场光学偏振仪阵列。设计了三种非同时巡天策略，包括对约200个活动星系核进行长期监测的策略。仪器在巡天模式下覆盖88.8平方度视场，通过15次1分钟曝光测量偏振。
AI.result: LAST-P能够测量暗至Gaia Bp星等约20.9源的偏振。对于星等17、18、19的源，在2.7角秒视宁度和约1大气质量条件下，线性偏振度的测量精度分别可达0.7%、1.5%和3.5%。
AI.conclusion: LAST-P将填补宽视场光学偏振观测的空白，为研究天体物理瞬变源、X射线双星、白矮星、星际介质和活动星系核提供重要数据，推动偏振天体物理学发展。

title: Limits on the mass of compact objects in Hořava-Lifshitz gravity
summary: It is known that there exist theoretical limits on the mass of compact objects in general relativity. One is the Buchdahl limit for an object with an arbitrary equation-of-state that turns out to be the limit for an object with uniform density. Another one is the causal limit that is stronger than the Buchdahl limit and is related to the speed of sound inside an object. Similar theoretical limits on the mass of compact objects in deformed Hořava-Lifshitz (HL) gravity are found in this \paper. Interestingly, the both curves of the uniform density limit and the sound speed limit meet the horizon curve at the minimum of the horizon, where a black hole becomes extremal, i.e., $M=q$, considering the Kehagias-Sfetsos vacuum that is an asymptotic flat solution in the HL gravity.

AI.tldr: 在变形Hořava-Lifshitz引力中发现了致密天体质量的理论极限，包括均匀密度极限和声速极限，两者在视界曲线最小值处相交
AI.motivation: 研究变形Hořava-Lifshitz引力中致密天体质量的理论极限，与广义相对论中的Buchdahl极限和因果极限进行对比
AI.method: 使用Kehagias-Sfetsos真空解（HL引力中的渐近平坦解），分析变形Hořava-Lifshitz引力中的致密天体质量极限
AI.result: 发现了均匀密度极限和声速极限，两者在视界曲线最小值处相交，此时黑洞达到极端状态（M=q）
AI.conclusion: 变形Hořava-Lifshitz引力中存在与广义相对论类似的质量极限，这些极限在黑洞极端状态下相交，揭示了该理论中致密天体的基本约束

title: Polarization rotation through differential transmission in refractive CMB telescopes identified using a hybrid physical optics method
summary: We identify a polarization rotation systematic in the far field beams of refractive cosmic microwave background (CMB) telescopes caused by differential transmission in anti-reflection (AR) coatings of optical elements. This systematic was identified following the development of a hybrid physical optics method that incorporates full-wave electromagnetic simulations of AR coatings to model the full polarization response of refractive systems. Applying this method to a two-lens CMB telescope with non-ideal AR coating, we show that polarization-dependent transmission can produce a rotation of the far-field polarization angle that varies across the focal plane with a typical amplitude of 0.05-0.5 degrees. If ignored in analysis, this effect can produce temperature to polarization leakage and Stokes Q/U mixing.

AI.tldr: 在折射式CMB望远镜中发现由AR涂层差异传输引起的偏振旋转系统误差，会导致0.05-0.5度的偏振角旋转，产生温度到偏振的泄漏和Q/U混合。
AI.motivation: 识别折射式宇宙微波背景望远镜中由抗反射涂层差异传输引起的偏振旋转系统误差，这种误差会影响CMB偏振测量的精度。
AI.method: 开发了混合物理光学方法，结合AR涂层的全波电磁模拟，对折射系统的完整偏振响应进行建模，并将其应用于具有非理想AR涂层的双透镜CMB望远镜。
AI.result: 偏振依赖传输会导致远场偏振角旋转，在焦平面上变化幅度为0.05-0.5度，如果忽略该效应，会产生温度到偏振的泄漏和斯托克斯Q/U混合。
AI.conclusion: AR涂层引起的偏振旋转系统误差是CMB望远镜中需要认真考虑的重要效应，需要在数据分析中加以校正，以提高偏振测量的准确性。

title: Motion of spinning particles and chaos bound in Reissner-Nordström spacetime
summary: In this paper, we investigates Lyapunov exponents of classical chaotic motion of spinning particles orbiting a Reissner-Nordström black hole and verifies the applicability of the chaos bound in the spinor field of this black hole. For a neutral particle, when its spin magnitude surpasses a specific threshold, the exponent exceeds the surface gravity, resulting in a violation of the bound. Given a fixed angular momentum, when the spin direction is opposite to that of the angular momentum, the exponent is greater than that when the two directions are aligned. For a charged particle, after considering the influence of the electromagnetic force, we find that for relatively large angular momenta, although the electromagnetic force does not change the trend of the exponent variation with respect to the spin or angular momentum and only modifies the specific values of the exponent, it still leads to violations of the bound. This result shows that the bound is violated in the spinor field.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了Reissner-Nordström黑洞周围自旋粒子经典混沌运动的Lyapunov指数，验证了混沌边界在自旋场中的适用性，发现对于中性粒子，当自旋超过特定阈值时指数会超过表面重力，违反边界；对于带电粒子，电磁力也会导致边界违反。
AI.motivation: 研究Reissner-Nordström黑洞周围自旋粒子混沌运动的Lyapunov指数，验证混沌边界在自旋场中的适用性，探索自旋和电磁力对混沌行为的影响。
AI.method: 通过分析中性粒子和带电粒子在Reissner-Nordström黑洞周围的经典混沌运动，计算Lyapunov指数，考虑自旋大小、方向以及电磁力的影响，与黑洞表面重力进行比较。
AI.result: 1. 中性粒子：当自旋大小超过特定阈值时，Lyapunov指数超过表面重力，违反混沌边界；自旋方向与角动量方向相反时指数更大。2. 带电粒子：电磁力不改变指数随自旋或角动量的变化趋势，但会修改具体数值，仍导致边界违反。
AI.conclusion: 混沌边界在自旋场中被违反，表明自旋和电磁力对黑洞周围粒子的混沌行为有重要影响，这为理解极端引力环境下的混沌动力学提供了新见解。

title: Can Dynamic Spectrum Sharing Protect Passive Radio Sciences?
summary: Dynamic Spectrum Sharing (DSS) is increasingly promoted as a key element of modern spectrum policy, driven by the rising demand from commercial wireless systems and advances in spectrum access technologies. Passive radio sciences, including radio astronomy, Earth remote sensing, and meteorology, operate under fundamentally different constraints. They rely on exceptionally low interference spectrum and are highly vulnerable to even brief radio frequency interference. We examine whether DSS can benefit passive services or whether it introduces new failure modes and enforcement challenges. We propose just-in-time quiet zones (JITQZ) as a mechanism for protecting high value observations and assess hybrid frameworks that preserve static protection for core passive bands while allowing constrained dynamic access in adjacent frequencies. We analyze the roles of propagation uncertainty, electromagnetic compatibility constraints, and limited spectrum awareness. Using a game theoretic framework, we show why non-cooperative sharing fails, identify conditions for sustained cooperation, and examine incentive mechanisms including pseudonymetry-enabled attribution that promote compliance. We conclude that DSS can support passive radio sciences only as a high-reliability, safety-critical system. Static allocations remain essential, and dynamic access is viable only with conservative safeguards and enforceable accountability.

AI.tldr: 论文探讨动态频谱共享（DSS）能否惠及被动无线电科学（如射电天文、地球遥感），提出"即时静默区"机制和混合保护框架，通过博弈论分析指出非合作共享会失败，强调DSS需作为高可靠性安全关键系统实施。
AI.motivation: 商业无线系统需求增长和技术进步推动动态频谱共享（DSS）发展，但被动无线电科学（射电天文、地球遥感、气象学）依赖极低干扰频谱，对射频干扰高度敏感。需要研究DSS是否能为被动服务带来益处，还是会引入新的故障模式和执法挑战。
AI.method: 提出"即时静默区"（JITQZ）机制保护高价值观测；设计混合保护框架（核心被动频段静态保护+相邻频段受限动态接入）；分析传播不确定性、电磁兼容约束和频谱感知限制；使用博弈论框架分析非合作共享失败原因，识别持续合作条件，研究包括伪度量归因在内的激励合规机制。
AI.result: 分析表明非合作共享会失败，需要建立持续合作条件；DSS只有在作为高可靠性、安全关键系统时才能支持被动无线电科学；静态分配仍然必不可少，动态接入只有在具备保守保障措施和可执行问责机制时才可行。
AI.conclusion: DSS可以为被动无线电科学提供支持，但必须作为高可靠性、安全关键系统实施。静态频谱分配仍然至关重要，动态频谱接入只有在具备保守保障措施和可执行问责机制的情况下才可行。需要混合保护框架和有效的激励合规机制。

title: Combining simulation-based inference and universal relations for precise and accurate neutron star science
summary: In this work, we propose a novel approach for identifying, constructing, and validating precise and accurate universal relations for neutron star bulk quantities. A central element is simulation-based inference (SBI), which we adopt to treat uncertainties due to the unknown nuclear equation of state (EOS) as intrinsic non-trivial noise. By assembling a large set of bulk properties of non-rotating neutron stars across multiple state-of-the-art EOS models, we are able to systematically explore universal relations in high-dimensional parameter spaces. Our framework further identifies the most promising parameter combinations, enabling a more focused and traditional construction of explicit universal relations. At the same time, SBI does not rely on explicit relations; instead, it directly provides predictive distributions together with a quantitative measure of systematic uncertainties, which are not captured by conventional approaches. As an example, we report a new universal relation that allows us to obtain the radius as a function of mass, fundamental mode, and one pressure mode. Our analysis shows that SBI can surpass the predictive power of this universal relation while also mitigating systematic errors. Finally, we demonstrate how universal relations can be further calibrated to mitigate systematic errors accurately.

AI.tldr: 提出基于模拟推理(SBI)的新方法，用于识别、构建和验证中子星宏观量的普适关系，通过处理核状态方程不确定性作为内在噪声，实现超越传统方法的预测能力。
AI.motivation: 传统构建中子星宏观量普适关系的方法难以处理核状态方程(EOS)的不确定性，这些不确定性通常被忽略或简化处理，导致系统误差。需要一种能系统处理EOS不确定性并量化系统误差的新方法。
AI.method: 采用模拟推理(SBI)框架，将EOS不确定性视为内在非平凡噪声。收集大量非旋转中子星宏观属性数据，系统探索高维参数空间的普适关系。框架能识别最有希望的参数组合，并直接提供预测分布和系统不确定性的定量度量。
AI.result: 报告了一个新的普适关系，能够通过质量、基模和一个压力模式来获取半径。分析显示SBI方法可以超越该普适关系的预测能力，同时减轻系统误差。还展示了如何进一步校准普适关系以准确减轻系统误差。
AI.conclusion: SBI方法为构建中子星宏观量普适关系提供了强大框架，能够处理EOS不确定性作为内在噪声，提供更可靠的预测分布和系统误差量化，超越传统方法的预测能力。

title: Observational Signatures of Accretion Disks around a Schwarzschild Black Hole in a Hernquist Dark Matter Halo
summary: We investigate how a Hernquist type dark matter (DM) halo, parametrized by its core radius $r_{s}$ and central density $ρ_{s}$, influences both the gravitational wave (GW) emission from timelike periodic orbits and the electromagnetic appearance of a thin accretion disk around a Schwarzschild black hole (BH). By analyzing the effective potential for timelike geodesics, we show that the DM halo shifts the marginally bound orbit (MBO) and the innermost stable circular orbit (ISCO) outward, reflecting its modification of the spacetime geometry and the energy-angular momentum structure of particle motion. Employing a semi-analytical method, we compute orbital trajectories and the associated GW waveforms, revealing that the DM halo alters the characteristic zoom-whirl dynamics and induces measurable changes in waveform morphology. Furthermore, we generate direct and secondary images of the accretion disk across various observer inclinations and find that increasing $r_{s}$ or $ρ_{s}$ results in cooler, dimmer disks with modified flux distributions. Our results demonstrate that the presence of a DM halo imprints distinct signatures in both gravitational and electromagnetic observables, offering a multimessenger pathway to probe DM environments near BHs.

AI.tldr: 研究暗物质晕对黑洞周围引力波和吸积盘观测的影响，发现暗物质晕会改变轨道动力学和电磁观测特征，为多信使探测暗物质提供新途径。
AI.motivation: 探索暗物质晕如何影响黑洞周围的引力波发射和吸积盘电磁观测，为通过多信使天文观测探测黑洞附近的暗物质环境提供理论基础。
AI.method: 分析Hernquist型暗物质晕参数化模型，研究其对类时测地线有效势的影响，计算轨道轨迹和引力波波形，并生成吸积盘的直接和次级图像。
AI.result: 暗物质晕使束缚轨道和稳定圆轨道向外移动，改变轨道动力学和引力波波形形态，同时使吸积盘温度降低、亮度减弱并改变通量分布。
AI.conclusion: 暗物质晕在引力波和电磁观测中都留下独特特征，为通过多信使方法探测黑洞附近的暗物质环境提供了可行途径。

title: A framework for LISA population inference
summary: The Laser Interferometer Space Antenna (LISA) is expected to have a source rich data stream containing signals from large numbers of many different types of source. This will include both individually resolvable signals and overlapping stochastic backgrounds, a regime intermediate between current ground-based detectors and pulsar timing arrays. The resolved sources and backgrounds will be fitted together in a high dimensional Global Fit. To extract information about the astrophysical populations to which the sources belong, we need to decode the information in the Global Fit, which requires new methodology that has not been required for the analysis of current gravitational wave detectors. Here, we %start that development, presenting present a hierarchical Bayesian framework to infer the properties of astrophysical populations directly from the output of a LISA Global Fit, consistently accounting for information encoded in both the resolved sources and the unresolved background. Using a simplified model of the Global Fit, we illustrate how the interplay between resolved and unresolved components affects population inference and highlight the impact of data analysis choices, such as the signal-to-noise threshold for resolved sources, on the results. Our approach provides a practical foundation for population inference using LISA data.

AI.tldr: 提出分层贝叶斯框架，从LISA全局拟合输出中推断天体物理群体性质，同时考虑已解析源和未解析背景的信息
AI.motivation: LISA将产生包含大量不同类型源的丰富数据流，包括可解析信号和重叠随机背景。需要新方法来从高维全局拟合中解码信息，以提取天体物理群体信息。
AI.method: 提出分层贝叶斯框架，直接从LISA全局拟合输出推断天体物理群体性质，一致地考虑已解析源和未解析背景中编码的信息。使用简化的全局拟合模型进行演示。
AI.result: 展示了已解析和未解析分量之间的相互作用如何影响群体推断，并突出了数据分析选择（如已解析源的信噪比阈值）对结果的影响。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为使用LISA数据进行群体推断提供了实用基础，解决了当前引力波探测器分析中未遇到的新挑战。

title: Symmetries of cosmological perturbations: The residual low multipole ambiguity
summary: In cosmology, long-wavelength modes are related to large-gauge transformations (LGT), i.e. changes of coordinates that modify the physical geometry of the cosmological patch. These LGTs stand as bona-fide symmetries of cosmological perturbation theory with various applications, from consistency relations constraining cosmological correlators to non-linear conservation laws in the separate-universe approach. In this work, we revisit LGTs and derive two new results. First, we show that the global symmetries already identified in the literature can be extended to local infinite-dimensional symmetries. The associated generators depend on arbitrary functions of time, and generate low-multipole modes that modify the mean curvature energy and the angular momentum of the patch, demonstrating their physical nature. We propose to interpret these low-multipole soft modes as a new cosmological-frame ambiguity that needs to be fixed prior to evaluating cosmological observables. Second, we demonstrate that the adiabatic cosmological perturbations generated by LGTs deform but preserve all the explicit and hidden Killing symmetries of the background geometry. As such, long-wavelength modes stand as a concrete example of algebraically-special cosmological perturbations of Petrov-type O, and inherit the conformal group as isometries and a set of four deformed Killing-Yano tensors and their associated Killing tensors. This opens the possibility to study their effect on cosmological observables in a fully analytic manner.

AI.tldr: 该论文扩展了宇宙学中的长波模式与规范变换理论，发现全局对称性可扩展为局部无限维对称性，并将长波模式解释为需要固定的新宇宙学框架模糊性。
AI.motivation: 在宇宙学中，长波模式与规范变换相关，这些变换作为宇宙学扰动理论的真实对称性有着重要应用。然而，现有研究主要关注全局对称性，需要进一步探索局部对称性及其物理意义。
AI.method: 重新审视大规范变换理论，推导出全局对称性可扩展为局部无限维对称性，分析相关生成元的时间依赖性，并证明长波模式保持背景几何的所有显式和隐藏Killing对称性。
AI.result: 1) 发现全局对称性可扩展为局部无限维对称性，生成元依赖于时间的任意函数；2) 这些变换产生改变平均曲率能量和角动量的低多极软模式；3) 长波模式保持背景几何的所有Killing对称性，属于Petrov-type O的特殊宇宙学扰动。
AI.conclusion: 长波模式代表了一种新的宇宙学框架模糊性，需要在计算宇宙学可观测量之前固定。这些模式保持背景对称性，属于代数特殊扰动，为解析研究其对宇宙学可观测量影响提供了新途径。

title: Parity-violating Dark Photon Halos
summary: We propose a mechanism for the generation of gravitationally bound dark photon halos during the matter-dominated era. Coupled to an ultralight axion field through a parity-violating Chern-Simons term, dark photons can be produced by the tachyonic instability of axion coherent oscillation. The dark photons with a net helicity lead to a metric vorticity and can generate chiral substructures. For axion masses in the range $10^{-28} \, \mathrm{eV} \lesssim m_a \lesssim 10^{-22} \, \mathrm{eV}$, the resulting inhomogeneities collapse to form halos with masses spanning $M_{\rm halo} \sim 10^5 \, M_{\odot}$ to $10^{11} \, M_{\odot}$, with halo sizes ranging from $O(1)$ to $O(10^{6}) \, \mathrm{pc}$. During halo collapse, the induced vorticity could mediate efficient angular-momentum transport, which enables monolithic collapse and provides primordial seeds for the early formation of supermassive black holes.

AI.tldr: 提出一种在物质主导时期生成引力束缚暗光子晕的机制，通过宇称破坏的Chern-Simons项与超轻轴子场耦合，轴子相干振荡的tachyonic不稳定性产生暗光子，形成具有净螺旋度的暗光子晕，最终坍缩形成质量范围10^5-10^11太阳质量的晕结构。
AI.motivation: 探索暗物质晕形成的替代机制，特别是超轻轴子与暗光子耦合如何产生引力束缚结构，为超大质量黑洞的早期形成提供原始种子。
AI.method: 通过宇称破坏的Chern-Simons项耦合超轻轴子场与暗光子场，利用轴子相干振荡的tachyonic不稳定性产生暗光子，这些暗光子具有净螺旋度并导致度规涡度，最终形成不均匀结构并坍缩成晕。
AI.result: 对于轴子质量范围10^{-28}eV到10^{-22}eV，形成质量10^5到10^{11}太阳质量的暗光子晕，尺度从1到10^6秒差距；晕坍缩过程中的诱导涡度促进有效角动量输运，实现单块坍缩并为早期超大质量黑洞形成提供种子。
AI.conclusion: 暗光子晕形成机制为暗物质晕和超大质量黑洞的早期形成提供了新途径，特别是在轴子质量特定范围内，通过轴子-暗光子耦合产生的螺旋度结构能够驱动引力坍缩过程。

title: Obstructions to global visibility of singularities in asymptotically flat spacetimes
summary: Consider an $(N+1)$-dimensional asymptotically flat spacetime and a future-directed, affinely parametrized outgoing null generator $γ$ of an achronal boundary $\partial J^+(S_\varepsilon)$, where $\{S_\varepsilon\}$ is a nested family of smooth compact codimension $2$ surfaces approaching a singular boundary set $S$ in the past. In the twist-free case and under the null energy condition, the Raychaudhuri equation on the $m:=N-1$ dimensional screen bundle reads, $$ θ'=-\frac1mθ^2-\|σ\|^2-\mathrm{Ric}(k,k), $$ where $k$ is the tangent to $γ$. This equation linearizes, via the rescaling $u:=A^{1/m}$ with $A := |\det D|$ the Jacobi-map $m$-volume, to the Sturm-type ODE $$ u''+\frac1m f\,u=0,\qquad f:=\|σ\|^2+\mathrm{Ric}(k,k)\ge 0. $$ We develop two purely generator-wise criteria forcing a first zero of $u$: (i) an exact Volterra identity combined with concavity leads to a barrier-weighted integral inequality, and (ii) Sturm comparison and a Prüfer-angle estimate yields failure of disconjugacy whenever $\int_c^d \sqrt{f/m}\,dλ>π$ on a subinterval. We prove that $u(λ_\ast)=0$ is equivalent to the existence of a focal (conjugate) point and implies $θ= m u'/u\to-\infty$ at $λ_\ast$. Using the standard structure of achronal boundaries, this yields a geodesic-wise obstruction: if every generator that could reach $\mathscr I^+$ satisfies one of the above conditions in the regular spacetime region, then $J^+(S_\varepsilon)\cap \mathscr I^+=\emptyset$, and hence $S$ is not globally visible. As an application, we illustrate one of these criteria in the Einstein-massless scalar field collapse model of Christodoulou.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了渐近平坦时空中零测地线的聚焦性质，通过雷乔杜里方程和雅可比映射，建立了两种判断共轭点存在的判据，并应用于引力塌缩模型的全局可见性分析。
AI.motivation: 研究渐近平坦时空中奇异边界集的全局可见性问题，特别是在引力塌缩背景下，理解哪些奇点可以被未来零无穷远观测到。
AI.method: 通过雷乔杜里方程和雅可比映射的线性化，建立两种纯生成元判据：1）基于Volterra恒等式和凹性的加权积分不等式；2）基于Sturm比较和Prüfer角估计的共轭点存在条件。
AI.result: 证明了u(λ∗)=0等价于存在焦（共轭）点，并导致θ→∞。如果所有可能到达未来零无穷远的生成元在规则时空区域满足上述条件之一，则S在全局上不可见。
AI.conclusion: 建立了零测地线聚焦的判据，并将其应用于引力塌缩模型的奇点可见性分析，为理解时空奇点的观测性质提供了数学工具。
